revised_title: Dr. Papin's Response to Mr. Nuis' Objections on the Engine for Raising Water by Rarefaction of Air
tldr: Dr. Papin addresses Mr. Nuis' objections to his engine for raising water through air rarefaction, explaining how the system works, refuting the objections, and suggesting improvements. He also discusses the potential for using multiple engines on a large river to increase water supply.
